answers.answer: So I took the test, not have serious headache and so so sleepy not to mention my baby girl is moving around in there like crazy!!! Waiting on the results!!
I go for mines in 2 weeks! I'm kind of scared to do it cuz all I've been drinking is Pepsi soda!!( which I know I'm not suppose to). I hope all goes well for u, and keep us updated.
I passed!!! So Dr. thinks that maybe it was just the way she was positioned that made her over measure!! :)
Congrats on passing! I have mine in a week. I passed with my other two pregnancies so I hoping I pass again.

glad everything went well with your test. how many weeks are you? im nervous with mine bc my husband is diabetic and ive checked mine a few times and it was the highest ive ever seen mine an hr after eating ugh hoping i'll pass this one.
I'm 26 weeks 4 days! He tested me a little bit early bc of what he saw in ultrasound...
o ok i thought my dr said would test around 28 weeks but wasn't sure so was just checking lol
28weeks is when they normally do test :)
I was told between 24 and 28 weeks. I have mine next week at 25 weeks.
Oh that seems early but I'm sure every Dr is different lol

question: I go for my test today to see if I have it, my doctor is pretty sure I do as I have all the risk factors and when they did my ultrasound they noticed her abdomen and stomach both measured almost 3 weeks ahead and he said that was a trend in GD... :( I didn't have it with either of my boys but both boys were over 9 pounds!
title: gestational diabetes!
